title: Diamond Head Cove Health Bar
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mostly a smoothies and juices bar near entrance to Diamond Head State Park. Menu includes a veggie wrap, salads, and others. Specialty is Manna Cove bowl which consists of acai fruit smoothie in a bowl with granola, also use honey, and bee pollen (so ask).
